name: PabloescabElf
description:
Collect all of the coins to unlock the portals, you can jump of the side of walls and perform a wall jump to get higher or you can fall of a platform then jump for more precision in your jump.

Can you defeat Slonks the Snowman drug lord?

Press “D” to move to the right >
Press “A” to move to the left <
Press “Space” to Jump ^
Press “LeftMB” to shoot 

Jump, shoot and race your way through 2 intense levels increasingly difficult, then face off against Slonks the Snowman drug lord and stop the illegal yellow snowball trading to save christmas
